dmca.title: Requesting immediate termination of illegal activity on ThePlanet.com's service
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: NCsoft IP Rights [mailto:iprights@ncsoft.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, November 21, 2006 3:54 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Requesting immediate termination of illegal activity on
ThePlanet.com's service
Subject: Requesting immediate termination of illegal activity on
ThePlanet.com's service



Hello,

Please review the attached PDF file concerning illegal activity on the
ThePlanet.com service. If there are any questions or concerns, or if I
may be of any assistance in the matter, please let me know.

Your prompt attention to this matter is most appreciated.

Thank you for your time,

Mitchell Burton

NCsoft North America

<<Cease and Desist (www.l2supremacy.com).pdf>>
